name: Hedonist
description:
USE PROMO CODE TAKE15 AT CHECKOUT WHEN YOU BUY MORE THAN ONE SHIRT FOR 15% OFF!!!! FREE SHIPPING IN USA!

Doesn't it seem like a world full of frivolity these days? Well, if not, let loose with the Hedonist.  

Complete with metallic gold wings and halo, show everyone your're devoted to the pursuit of pleasure and self-gratification in a stylish V-neck.

On a crisp white American Apparel organic V-neck T-shirt, this Alex Rebele limited edition will only be printed 100 times before it's gone.

American Apparel T description: 100% organic cotton; combed for softness and comfort; durable rib neckband.  The softest, smoothest, best-looking organic V-neck T-shirt available anywhere.  100% Fine Jersey cotton construction Durable rib V-neckband 

Chest (inches)   
S 34-36   
M 38-40   
L 42-44   
XL 46-48   

Waist (inches)   
S 30-32   
M 32-33   
L 33-34   
XL 36-38   
 
Chest:
Measure under arms around the fullest part of the chest. Be sure to keep tape level across back and comfortably loose. 
 
Waist:
Measure around natural waist with a loose tape.

name: Wings of Steel
description:
USE PROMO CODE TAKE15 AT CHECKOUT WHEN YOU BUY MORE THAN ONE SHIRT FOR 15% OFF!!!! FREE SHIPPING IN USA!

Bringing out that industrial grunge from a city built by it.

Another Alex Rebele design, the skull and bones are built from the city of Pittsburgh bridges and signs.  Alex spent countless hours photographing the city, documenting such historical landmarks as the Smithfield St. Bridge to make each piece of this illustration.  

Printed  on a white organic Anvil crew T-shirt, this limited edition shirt will be printed only 100 times, then gone forever. 

Anvil T description: 100% preshrunk certified organic cotton; shoulder-to-shoulder tape; White and Natural are sewn with cotton thread; double-needle stitched sleeves and bottom hem.
